revised_title: Spectra of Ignited Gases and Vapours: Exploring Different Spectra of Elementary Gaseous Substances
tldr: The authors investigate the spectra of ignited gases and vapors, focusing on the different spectra of elementary gaseous substances. They examine various substances, including nitrogen, sulfur, selenium, carbon, hydrogen, oxygen, phosphorus, and metals, using electric discharges and flames to observe their spectral properties.
